name: CustomerGateway
shortDesc: Provides information to AWS about your VPN customer gateway device.

properties.name: BgpAsn
properties.desc: The customer gateway's Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Autonomous System Number (ASN).
properties.type: Number BgpAsn is always an integer value.

properties.name: IpAddress
properties.desc: The internet-routable IP address for the customer gateway's outside interface. The address must be static.

properties.name: Tags
properties.desc: The tags that you want to attach to the resource.

properties.name: Type
properties.desc: The type of VPN connection that this customer gateway supports.
